import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowTask=_ref=>{let{taskList,setTaskList,task,setTask}=_ref;const handleDelete=taskid=>{const seltaskList=taskList.filter(taskList=>taskList.id!==taskid);console.log(seltaskList);setTaskList(seltaskList);};const handleEdit=taskid=>{console.log(taskid);task=taskList.find(taskList=>taskList.id===taskid);setTask(task);//setTaskList(ediTaskList, ...taskList);
